1352650.name: Bomber
1352650.description:
Bomber is a lighthearted arcade puzzle game designed for kids and families. Your goal is simple: use bombs to blast through walls, find hidden keys, and reach the exit door to complete each level.

  • Shield â€“ stay protected for a short time

  • 20 fun and challenging levels

  • Colorful, kid-friendly graphics

Bomber is the perfect time-killer game for kids and families who enjoy puzzles, arcade action, and simple fun.
